contents.item: If you are strong enough to face Fear of Failure, Fear of Rejections, and Fear of Criticism, that's the sign of Success.
The Real Success is helping others to get Succeed
contents.owner: Sivaprakash Sidhu Sivaprakash G Sivaprakash Gopal

contents.item: Success demands consistent effort and hard work.
If I listened to all the noise in the worldI would have many standards to conform to But the zeal to succeedCuts through the racket
contents.owner: Priscilla Koranteng, Trails to the Stream: Poetry and Inspiration for Everyday Living

contents.item: Self-trust is the first secret of success.
Most people don't lay the foundations correctly because they are too impatient or too greedy or too stupid ...
contents.owner: Andrew   Crofts, Secrets of the Italian Gardener

contents.item: An Attitude of Gratitude Delivers To You Altitude of Beatitudes.
Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is in the doing, not the getting - in the trying, not the triumph.
What are you doing today that serves the greater mission for your life? Once you can answer that question without batting an eye, that's when you're really on to something.

Never stop writing. Whether you’re writing a novel, screen play or just keeping a journal, it’s integral that you make writing a daily process. The proof of the commitment to your craft is just how much time you spend doing it, whether it’s for business or pleasure. Integrate your craft into your every day life, and you’ll be as good as gold.
I was afraid I wrote neither well enough nor ill enough for success.
contents.owner: E.W. Hornung, Raffles: The Amateur Cracksman

contents.item: Transformational tools enhance one's clarity, competence, compassion, and empower you to achieve anything that seems impossible to you and others.
Success is never about money, it's always about talent.
You have to work for what you want.
To be successful you have to be dumb enough to think you can change the world and smart enough to know how.
Spend more time with people who bring out the best in you.
contents.owner: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!

contents.item: That your friend is succeeding does not mean you are failing.
Achieving success is your ability to eliminate the weakness and biases that are inherent within yourself
contents.owner: Julian Pencilliah, The Jetstream of Success

contents.item: I couldn’t wait for success ― so I went ahead without it.
You can win in multiple ways - A managershould never restrict himself when it comes to exploring possibilities.
contents.owner: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!
